large.description: Use this for most common components (think buttons, formfields,...)

defaultfocus.description: default focus transparency for most components.

125.description: lineheight is 125% of font size, use for copy

150.description: lineheight is 150% of font size (use for titles)

key.description: key color used on most components

container.description: elements needing less emphasis than key
elements needing less emphasis than secondary.key
elements needing less emphasis than error.key
elements needing less emphasis than warning.key
elements needing less emphasis than success.key
elements needing less emphasis than info.key

default.description: Decorative color variant - default value

hover.description: Decorative color variant - darker value for usage like hover states etc.

pressed.description: Decorative color variant - darker value for usage like hover states etc.

key.description: The background color appears behind scrollable content
Surface colors affect surfaces of components, such as cards, sheets, and menus.

variant.description: surface variant color, often used in selected/activated states

key.description: Color that keeps a contrast ratio above AA when primary.key is used as background color

container.description: Color that keeps a contrast ratio above AA when primary.container is used as background color

key.description: Color that keeps a contrast ratio above AA when secondary.key is used as background color

container.description: Color that keeps a contrast ratio above AA when secondary.container is used as background color

key.description: Color that keeps a contrast ratio above AA when signal.info.key is used as background color

container.description: Color that keeps a contrast ratio above AA when signal.info.container is used as background color

key.description: use for (text) elements on surface color - high emphasis

variant.description: color used for disabled elements on disabled or surface backgrounds

fallback.description: Token only used to communicate fallback font preference (serif vs sans-serif).

small.description: Emulates Icon Sizebased on text for system Icons in components

medium.description: Emulates Icon Sizebased on text for system Icons in components

large.description: Emulates Icon Sizebased on text for system Icons in components

horizontal.description: left and right padding for small squish inset

vertical.description: top and bottom padding for small squish inset

horizontal.description: left and right padding for medium squish inset

vertical.description: top and bottom padding for medium squish inset

horizontal.description: left and right padding for medium squish inset

vertical.description: top and bottom padding for medium squish inset

horizontal.description: left and right padding for large squish inset

vertical.description: top and bottom padding for large squish inset

horizontal.description: left and right padding for medium squish inset

vertical.description: top and bottom padding for medium squish inset

xSmall.description: Use for extra small vertical gaps between elements. For example vertical gap between Label and textfield.

small.description: Use for small vertical gaps between elements.

medium.description: Use for medium vertical gaps between elements.

large.description: Use for large vertical gaps between elements.

xSmall.description: Use for extra small inline gaps between elements. For example gap between icon and hint text in a textfield.

small.description: Use for small inline gaps between elements. For example gap between Leading or trailing icons and the text in a button or textfield

medium.description: Use for medium inline gaps between elements.

large.description: Use for large inline gaps between elements.

gap.description: Gap between icons and button label

default.description: padding without icons

icon.description: Padding when icons present. Only apply on side where icon is.

minWidth.description: sets a minimum width on buttons

dense.description: sets height of input field for dense representation

default.description: sets height of input field

border.description: borderwidth for input elements in default state
borderwidth for input elements in focus state

large.description: Large Icon size. Used as icon size in medium button.

xLarge.description: xLarge Icon size. Used in Large buttons

default.description: Default Action item size (like checkbox, switch, radio button,...)

handle.description: handle/circle of certain actions like the switch or a radio button
